IP_SYN_2_style_9:
DIAGNOSIS: Alveolar Proteinosis.
PROCEDURE: Unilateral total lung washing.
DETAILS: Under anesthesia, we isolated the lungs. We flooded the left lung with saline solution and applied percussion. The returned fluid was initially turbid but clarified after multiple cycles. We completed the cleansing and removed the airway tube. The patient required close monitoring post-op.
